Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion due to signal problems at 63rd Ashland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion due to signal problems at 63rd Ashland.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Fullerton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Fullerton. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
